website_summaries.verdict: Designed to clean the teeth and tongue and massage the gums, this easy-to-hold toothbrush for baby is a top seller.
pros: Suitable for 6 months to 2 years of age
Short handle is easy for little ones to hold
Safety shield ensures baby doesn't put brush too far in the mouth
cons: Occasional complaints about the durability of the brush

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 18 months and used this brush for about a week before the top rubber part lifted. Which can harbor germs and if she bites it off can become a choking hazard. I love the style of the brush and that she can hold it easily. But this was a defect?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Timm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes it! Small enough for her little mouth. I’ve never seen the mouth guard before but it seems to work to keep her from putting it too far into her mouth. Perfect size for little hands to hold too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Perkins

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles on this toothbrush comes apart. My baby almost ingested multiple of the plastic , sharp bristles. In the process of reporting the product to get it recalled.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: nice value for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is for my granddaughter, she loves it. She's 14 months old and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Debie

customer_reviews.title: new favorite toy for my little one
customer_reviews.text: My little one won't let it go even after finish brushing. It became her favorite toy... since she's teething. But it is soft enough for baby to play with and the size is perfect also for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Eunjoo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it
customer_reviews.text: KIds love the brush as long as they like it its good then.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleem

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush to start your kids on brushing their teeth
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Not harmful to their gums unlike other
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes this than the other toothbrush they tried
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is learning to brush her teeth. The guard on this works perfect so she doesn’t gag herself! I highly recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Darby Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Missing Bristles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, but unfortunately one of the toothbrushes came with missing bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Best Infant Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: We had tried quite a few toothbrushes before these and these are by far the best. Even when my daughter was an infant this was the only toothbrush that didn't upset her or her gums. The guard is great too for when they are transitioning to brushing their own teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: MAM Baby Toothbrush, Baby's Brush, Girl, 6+ Months, 2-Count, Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkMAM oral care products have been developed with pediatric dentists to ensure babies develop effective and lasting oral hygiene habits from the beginning. The MAM Baby's Brush baby toothbrush has a compact handle perfectly sized for baby's hands so they can learn how to brush their teeth independently. The soft rounded bristles remove plaque and bacteria, and the head adapts perfectly to baby's mouth, making it the ideal Baby's Brush for baby. The bottom of the handle on this first toothbrush is uniquely shaped to massage sensitive gums and cleans baby's tongue. With its short handle to help baby practice brushing on their own and red bristles to indicate the recommended amount of toothpaste to use, the MAM Baby's Brush for baby helps baby begin to use a toothbrush on their own.
feature_bullets: PROMOTES ORAL CARE IN BABIES 6+ MONTHS: Baby toothbrush cleans mouth & gums and helps establish an oral care routine as babies develop their first teeth. Includes two MAM Baby’s Brush toothbrushes with soft, rounded bristles and one safety shield.
SAFETY SHIELD: Includes one Safety Shield attached to the baby's brush toothbrush to ensure that the brush stays at a safe distance from the back of baby's mouth.

EASY TRANSITION TO INDEPENDENT BRUSHING: Short and compact handle on the Baby's Brush is easy for both babies and toddlers to hold and use on their own as they begin to brush their teeth independently.
BRUSHY THE BEAR MAKES BRUSHING FUN: Playful character on this baby toothbrush encourages children to brush and comes to life on an interactive app available on the App Store and Google Play.

PREMIUM EUROPEAN MATERIALS: Made in Europe from high quality, 100% baby safe, BPA & BPS-free materials. MAM Baby's Brush and all MAM oral care products meet or exceed both U.S. & European safety standards.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars164 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
